reg.desc: SMNCLK. The clock frequency might change every time SysExam is run. This field serves to provide guidance and the result should not be compared against the recommended value
CC6 status for the cores, each bit maps to a core
DF Clock Power Down when in C-state

Screen refresh rate lower bound. Assuming a 19x10 panel, pixel clock would be 148500MHz. If Freesync is disabled, OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN = OTG_V_TOTAL_MAX = 1125 in decimal, and refresh rate = 148500*1000 / (2200 * 1125) = 60 Hz. If Freesync is enabled, refresh rate >= 148500*1000 / (2200 * OTG_V_TOTAL_MIN in decimal)

Coarse Grain Clock Gating (CGCG), 0 if in GFXOFF
Medium Grain Clock Gating (MGCG), 0 if in GFXOFF
L3 Mesh Clock Gating. 0: Off, 1: Request, 2: Memory, 3: Dataflow

Doesn't work in A0, works in B0
